channel.title: Question about quest tab
channel.description:
I have two questions about the quest tab and I believe one might actually be client sided so I apologize for posting it here, I just felt like it would be best to do it on one post since they both have to do about the quest tab.
1) I've removed all the quests from the list and also got rid of the "Free Quests" text but the "Members Quests" is still there, is there a way to remove this also?
2) When you hover over the quest list you still see the names come up in the top left corner, can you remove/change the names?
Thanks for any help you can give and thanks for your time.
Cheers
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/9uxcsi.png[/img]

item.title: Question about quest tab
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

beale:

To remove the “Members Quests” text, try going into client.java and doing ctrl+f “Members quests” and delete the text

The text is actually part of the interface. Just like “FREE QUESTS” and all the quests he removed.

OP:

  1. The ID of the text is 682, use packet 126 to rename it to whatever you’d like.

  2. To remove the hover text from the tab, you will need to modify the client in 1 of two ways:
    A) add code into RSInterface to replace all the quest tab text with nothing (So just blank text).
    B) Modify packet 126 to change the tooltip text in the top corner along with the actual interface text.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about quest tab
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

To remove the “Members Quests” text, try going into client.java and doing ctrl+f “Members quests” and delete the text
